note:
Stately plump, Ryan Reed (Again). Aspiring worder and current Creative Writing MFA student at the University of Missouri Kansas City. Just trying to surround myself with kind, creative folks! I am an old dude who has lived in AR, TN, NY, PA, and MO.

Avatar: Black and white photo of our dude, bearded, wearing AirPods, Yankees ball cap, sunglasses, and holding a plastic skull like a poor Yorick.

Header: Illustration of the eight planets of our solar system. Pluto, don't @ me.
